blocks.text: This dashboard provides an overview and details on open and overdue invoices.

Structure of the Dashboard
  Page 1 - Overview: Leading KPIs, a Process Discovery Widget and a Business Case Calculator
Page 2 - Impact: Overview of all Late Payments in the current data set and their impact on your PTP process
Page 3 - Root Causes: Deep Dive into drivers of Late Payments
Page 4 - Take Action: A collection of ideas to tackle the drivers of inefficiencies
Page 5 - Case Details: An exportable list of single invoices and their most important attributes that can be filtered.
Please see our Dashboard Documentation for more information on how to manage your dashboards.
Kindly provide feedback on the Dashboard, this will aid us in enhancing its functionality.

children.name: Business Case Calculator
children.description: * FTE Cost / Min = ($70,000 รท  261 days/year รท 8 hours/ day รท  60 min/hr) = $0.56

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
COUNT("Last FI Invoice ID") FILTER (
	WHERE ("Last FI Invoice Item Clearing Date" IS NULL)
	AND "Last FI Invoice Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()))
FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT 
SUM("Last FI Invoice Item Gross Amount in USD")  FILTER (
	WHERE ("Last FI Invoice Item Clearing Date" IS NULL)
    AND "Last FI Invoice Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()))
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Open Invoices that are due in the next 7 days

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
COUNT("Last FI Invoice ID") FILTER (
	WHERE ("Last FI Invoice Item Clearing Date" IS NULL)
    AND "Last FI Invoice Item Due Date"- DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) > DURATION '7DAYS'
   )
FROM THIS_PROCESS

children.name: Open Invoice Value that is due in the next 7 days

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
SUM("Last FI Invoice Item Gross Amount in USD") FILTER (
	WHERE ("Last FI Invoice Item Clearing Date" IS NULL
    AND "Last FI Invoice Item Due Date"- DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW())
    >  DURATION '7DAYS'
	)
)
FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT 
SUM("Last FI Invoice Item Gross Amount in USD")  FILTER (
	WHERE ("Last FI Invoice Item Clearing Date" IS NULL)
	)
FROM THIS_PROCESS

SELECT 
"PO Vendor Name" AS "Vendor"
,SUM ("Last FI Invoice Item Gross Amount Local Curr.") AS "Invoice Amount in $"
,COUNT("Last FI Invoice ID") AS "No. of Invoices"
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
WHERE ("Last FI Invoice Item Clearing Date" IS NULL)
  AND "Last FI Invoice Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) 
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 2 DESC

blocks.text:
Definition:
An Invoice is considered "Open Overdue" when it was not cleared yet, but the due date is in the past already.
"Last FI Invoice Item Clearing Date" IS NULL AND "Last FI Invoice Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW())

children.name: Open Overdue Invoices by Purchasing Organization

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
"PO Item Plant Purchasing Organization" AS "Purchasing Organization"
,SUM ("Last FI Invoice Item Gross Amount Local Curr.") AS "Invoice Amount in $"
,COUNT("Last FI Invoice ID") AS "No. of Invoices"
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
WHERE ("Last FI Invoice Item Clearing Date" IS NULL)
  AND "Last FI Invoice Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) 
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 2 DESC

children.name: Open Overdue Payments Overview, sorted by Invoice Amount

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
"PO Vendor Name"
,"PO Company Name"
,"PO Purchasing Group"
,"PO Type"
,"PO Item Material Group"
,"PO Item Plant Name"
,COUNT("Last FI Invoice ID") AS "No. of Invoices"
,SUM ("Last FI Invoice Item Gross Amount in USD") AS "Invoice Amount in $"
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
WHERE ("Last FI Invoice Item Clearing Date" IS NULL)
  AND "Last FI Invoice Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) 
GROUP BY 1,2,3,4,5,6
ORDER BY 8 DESC

SELECT 
"PO Vendor Name" AS "Vendor"
,SUM ("Last FI Invoice Item Gross Amount Local Curr.") AS "Invoice Amount in $"
,COUNT("Last FI Invoice ID") AS "No. of Invoices"
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
WHERE ("Last FI Invoice Item Clearing Date" IS NULL)
  AND "Last FI Invoice Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) 
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 2 DESC

blocks.text:
Definition:
An Invoice is considered "Open Overdue" when it was not cleared yet, but the due date is in the past already.
"Last FI Invoice Item Clearing Date" IS NULL AND "Last FI Invoice Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW())

children.name: Invoices that are due in the coming days

columnConfigurations.columnName: Last FI Invoice Item Due Date - DATE_TRUNC(["day", "NOW"])

dataSource.query:
SELECT DISTINCT
"Last FI Invoice ID" AS "Invoice Number"
,"PO Vendor Name" 
,"Last FI Invoice Item Due Date"
,"Last FI Invoice Item Due Date"- DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) AS "Days until Due"
,SUM("Last FI Invoice Item Gross Amount Local Curr.") AS "Invoice Amount in $"

FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE ("Last FI Invoice Item Clearing Date" IS NULL)
AND "Last FI Invoice Posting Date" IS NOT NULL IS NOT NULL
AND "Last FI Invoice ID" IS NOT NULL

-- show only invoices that are due in the future
--AND "Last FI Invoice Item Due Date"- DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) > DURATION '0DAYS' 
ORDER BY 3 desc

children.name: Open Overdue Invoices by Purchasing Organization

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
"PO Item Plant Purchasing Organization" AS "Purchasing Organization"
,SUM ("Last FI Invoice Item Gross Amount Local Curr.") AS "Invoice Amount in $"
,COUNT("Last FI Invoice ID") AS "No. of Invoices"
FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
WHERE ("Last FI Invoice Item Clearing Date" IS NULL)
  AND "Last FI Invoice Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) 
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 2 DESC

children.name: Process Inefficiencies leading to Overdue Payments

dataSource.query:
SELECT
"PO Company Name"
,"Invoice Amount in $"
,"No. of Invoices"
,"Avg. Payment Block Rate in %"
,"Avg. days from posting to due date"
,"Automatic Invoice Posting in %"
,"Rework Rate in %"
,"Change Rate in %"
FROM
	(SELECT
	  "PO Company Name"
	  ,SUM("Last FI Invoice Item Gross Amount in USD") AS "Invoice Amount in $"    
      ,COUNT("Last FI Invoice ID") AS "No. of Invoices"
      ,AVG("Payment Block Rate") AS "Avg. Payment Block Rate in %"
	  ,AVG("Last FI Invoice Item Due Date" - "Last FI Invoice Posting Date") AS "Avg. days from posting to due date"
      ,COUNT("Last FI Invoice ID") FILTER(WHERE "Event Created By User Type" MATCHES ('System') AND event_name MATCHES('Create FI Invoice'))/COUNT("Last FI Invoice ID") AS "Automatic Invoice Posting in %"
      ,COUNT("Last FI Invoice ID") FILTER (WHERE(SELECT BOOL_OR (occurrence > 1)FROM(SELECT OCCURRENCE(event_name) AS occurrence) AS sub))/COUNT("Last FI Invoice ID")*100 AS "Rework Rate in %"
	  ,COUNT("Last FI Invoice ID") FILTER(WHERE event_name MATCHES (ILIKE '%update%'))/COUNT("Last FI Invoice ID") * 100 AS "Change Rate in %"
	  FROM
		  (SELECT DISTINCT
			 "PO Company Name"
             ,COUNT("Last FI Invoice ID") FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Remove Payment Block'))/ COUNT("Last FI Invoice ID") * 100 AS "Payment Block Rate" 
			 ,"Last FI Invoice ID"
			 ,"Last FI Invoice Item Gross Amount in USD"
			 ,"Last FI Invoice Item Due Date"
			 ,"Last FI Invoice Item Clearing Date"
             ,"Last FI Invoice Posting Date"
             ,"Event Created By User Type"
             ,"event_name"
             FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
		   WHERE  ("Last FI Invoice Item Clearing Date" IS NULL) AND "Last FI Invoice Item Due Date" < DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) 
          ) AS SUB1
		  GROUP BY 1
		  ORDER BY 2 desc
	) AS SUB2

children.name: Current status - what was the last activity

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
  COUNT("Last FI Invoice ID") AS "No. of Invoices"
  ,Last_event_name AS "Last activity"
  ,AVG("AVG Days until Due") AS "AVG Days until Due"
FROM 
  (SELECT 
    "Last FI Invoice ID"
    ,LAST(event_name) AS "Last_event_name"
    ,"Last FI Invoice Item Due Date"- DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) AS "AVG Days until Due"
  FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
  WHERE ("Last FI Invoice Item Clearing Date" IS NULL)
  AND "Last FI Invoice ID" IS NOT NULL
  ) as a
ORDER BY 1 desc

children.name: Take Action on Open Invoices that are due soon

blocks.text:
The below tables show invoices that are due in the next few days. On the right table, you see the last activity that was performed on the invoice.
These tables are sorted by the "Days until Due Date" and can be exported to csv.

children.name: Current status - what was the last activity

columnConfigurations.columnName: Last FI Invoice Item Due Date - DATE_TRUNC(["day", "NOW"])

dataSource.query:
SELECT 
"Last FI Invoice ID" AS "Invoice Number"
,LAST(event_name) AS "Last Activity"
,"Last FI Invoice Item Due Date"- DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) AS "Days until Due"

FROM FLATTEN(THIS_PROCESS)
WHERE ("Last FI Invoice Item Clearing Date" IS NULL)
AND "Last FI Invoice ID" IS NOT NULL

children.name: Invoices that are due in the coming days

columnConfigurations.columnName: DATE_TRUNC(["day", "NOW"]) - Last FI Invoice Item Due Date

dataSource.query:
SELECT DISTINCT
"Last FI Invoice ID" AS "Invoice Number"
,"PO Vendor Name" 
,"Last FI Invoice Item Due Date"
,(DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) - "Last FI Invoice Item Due Date") AS "Days until Due"
,SUM("Last FI Invoice Item Gross Amount Local Curr.") AS "Invoice Amount in $"

FROM THIS_PROCESS
WHERE "Last FI Invoice Item Clearing Date" IS NULL
AND "Last FI Invoice Posting Date" IS NOT NULL
AND "Last FI Invoice ID" IS NOT NULL

-- show only invoices that are due in the future
 AND (DATE_TRUNC('day', NOW()) - "Last FI Invoice Item Due Date") < DURATION '7DAYS' 
ORDER BY 5 desc

children.name: Case Table of Open Overdue Invoices

dataSource.query:
SELECT
"Last FI Invoice ID" AS "Invoice Number"
,"Last FI Invoice Item Gross Amount in USD" AS "Invoice Amount in $"
,"Last FI Invoice Document Type Text" AS "Doc Type" 
,"Last FI Invoice Cash Discount in USD" AS "Cash Discount Amount"
,"Last FI Invoice Company Name" AS "Company Code" 
,"Last FI Invoice Item G/L Account Number" AS "G/L Account Number"
,"Last FI Invoice Item Profit Center" AS "Profit Center"
,"PO Vendor Name"
,"PO Vendor Number"

--  all date fields
,"Last FI Invoice Receipt Date" AS "Invoice Receipt Date"
,"Last FI Invoice Posting Date" AS "Posting Date"
,"Last FI Invoice Item Clearing Entry Date" AS "Clearing Entry Date"
,"Last FI Invoice Item Clearing Date" AS "Clearing Date"
,"Last FI Invoice Item Cash Discount 1 Due Date" AS "CD due date 1"
,"Last FI Invoice Item Cash Discount 2 Due Date" AS "CD due date 2"
,"Last FI Invoice Item Due Date" AS "Due Date"

-- aggregated KPIs
,AVG((SELECT LAST(END_TIME)) - (SELECT FIRST(END_TIME))) AS "Total Cycle Time"
,AVG("Last FI Invoice Posting Date" - "Last FI Invoice Receipt Date") AS "avg time invoice receipt to posting"
--,AVG("Last FI Invoice Item Clearing Date" - "Last FI Invoice Posting Date") AS "avg time posting to clearing"
--,AVG("Last FI Invoice Item Clearing Date" - "Last FI Invoice Item Due Date") AS "No. of days paid late"

FROM "THIS_PROCESS"
WHERE "Last FI Invoice Item Clearing Date" IS NULL AND "Last FI Invoice ID" IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY 3 desc
LIMIT 500
